com.example.segfaultsquadapplication.display.profile.SearchResultAdapter
public class SearchResultAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<com.example.segfaultsquadapplication.display.profile.SearchResultAdapter.ViewHolder>
This file is for the searching users among the list of users in a recyclerview handles user clicks into the view
